response.overview: In the context of a comedy about the headmaster of the school of Ashour, who runs it with the utmost severity and cruelty, the father, Wirth, the son of Salah, dies, despite the fact that he does not receive secondary school certificate and is assisted by the master of the school until his administration takes over. Salah is once again trying to change the situation of teachers and students to the best. Secondary certificate.
response.title: مسرحية قشطه
